<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1918</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Myths and the Sky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mythen und der Himmel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mythes et le ciel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mitos e o céu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Miti ed il cielo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μύθοι και ο ουρανός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mitos y el cielo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for beginner English students, where the student learns some ancient Myths about the sky , learns about constellations and does creative writing on the subject</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">creative writing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">constellations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">myths</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für englische 
Kursteilnehmer des Anfängers, in denen der Kursteilnehmer einige alte
Mythen über den Himmel erlernt, erlernt über Konstellationen und tut
kreatives Schreiben auf dem Thema</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais de débutant, où l'étudiant apprend quelques 
mythes antiques au sujet du ciel, se renseigne sur des constellations 
et fait l'écriture créatrice sur le sujet</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses do novato, onde o estudante aprende alguns mitos 
antigos sobre o céu, aprende sobre constelações e faz a escrita 
creativa no assunto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli 
allievi inglesi del principiante, in cui l'allievo impara alcuni miti 
antichi circa il cielo, impara circa le costellazioni e fa la 
scrittura creativa sull'oggetto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές αρχαρίων, όπου ο σπουδαστής μαθαίνει 
μερικούς αρχαίους μύθους για τον ουρανό, μαθαίνει για τους 
αστερισμούς και κάνει το δημιουργικό γράψιμο στο θέμα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses del principiante, donde el estudiante aprende 
algunos mitos antiguos sobre el cielo, aprende sobre las 
constelaciones y hace la escritura creativa en el tema</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreatives Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
